remarks: Less-than-or-equal in terms of less-than.  ( ~ sspss analog.) (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)
statement:
pleval2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pleval2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
pleval2.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
pleval2 $p |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .<_ Y <-> ( X .< Y \/ X = Y ) ) ) $.
